attacks.name: Powerful Slap
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Aura Sphere
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
